import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create part"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new part record for inventory management and ticket parts allocation.

**Prerequisites**
1. **StandardSupplierId** (optional) - Use [POST /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/new](/docs/api/parts/create-part-supplier) to create a supplier, then extract `Item.PartSupplierId` from response.

**Workflow Example**
1. (Optional) Create a supplier: [POST /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/new](/docs/api/parts/create-part-supplier) to get `Item.PartSupplierId`.
2. Create the part: [POST /api/v1.0/parts/new](/docs/api/parts/create-part) with name, cost, and optional supplier.
3. Verify creation: [GET /api/v1.0/parts/\{PartId\}](/docs/api/parts/get-part-by-id) using returned `Item.PartId`.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Name.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={undefined}
